name: Wrapped Liquid Staked Ether 2.0
description: This token is the wrapped (non-rebasing version) of Lido Finance's Liquid Staking Derivative for ETH 2.0. For it, your balance will remain constant while the token increases in value over time due to staking rewards accured.
